'''Adeptus' Temptation''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Adeptus' Temptation is obtainable from the [[Luxurious Chest]] at the [[Dwelling in the Clouds]], the floating island above [[Qingyun Peak]]. Adeptus' Temptation can also be obtained as a reward from the [[World Quest]] ''[[Nine Pillars of Peace]]''.

Depending on the quality, Adeptus' Temptation increases the party's Attack by '''260'''/'''316'''/'''372''' and Critical Rate by '''8'''/'''10'''/'''12'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* {{Mail Attachments by Category List|Delicious Adeptus' Temptation;Adeptus' Temptation;Suspicious Adeptus' Temptation}}
* To celebrate the Chinese New Year, the [[Teyvat Food Notes]] released a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/14099 real-life recipe] for Adeptus' Temptation. Unlike other blog posts in the series which featured one to two characters, this post included all playable Liyue characters at the time of posting.
* Although it is declined when presented, Adeptus' Temptation is mentioned in [[Ganyu]]'s Chinese, Japanese and Korean "Favorite Food" voice line.<ref>{{Ref/VO|character=Ganyu|vo=喜欢的食物…|lang=zh}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/VO|character=Ganyu|vo=好きな食べ物…|lang=ja}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/VO|character=Ganyu|vo=좋아하는_음식...|lang=ko}}</ref>

===Etymology===
* This dish is a reference to the real-life dish, {{w|Buddha Jumps Over the Wall|Buddha's Temptation}} (or Buddha Jumps Over the Wall). The name of Adeptus' Temptation is {{zh|'''仙'''跳墙|rm='''Xiān'''tiàoqiáng|tl='''Adeptus''' Jumps over the Wall}}, while Buddha's Temptation is {{zh|'''佛'''跳墙|rm='''Fó'''tiàoqiáng}}.
** In the Delicious variant's description, ''"This dish is a rare and exquisite mix of both land and sea"'' refers to the variety of ingredients used in Buddha's Temptation, such as quail eggs, bamboo shoots, scallops, sea cucumber, abalone, shark fin, fish maw, chicken, Jinhua ham, pork tendon, ginseng, mushrooms, and taro.
** Buddha's Temptation was dubbed the most expensive soup in 2015, which is reflected in-game by being a 5-star dish.
